text: Jessica Simpson gave birth to a baby boy on Sunday, named Ace Knute Johnson. It ’ s the second child for the singer, 32, and her fiancé, football player Eric Johnson, 33, after daughter Maxwell, who is 14 months old. A source said the couple is planning on getting married in a few months, with Simpson reportedly saying “ Let ’ s have this wedding already before I get pregnant with another one! ” They were engaged in fall 2010, but have postponed their wedding due to her back - to - back pregnancies.
